unnormalised: ## Flash Sale: Dōḷō dhāmp ani tū tē sāḍī chukōytā, Bhau!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink ani tumi tem saree chuktolat, Beta!

unnormalised: Barē, lokhō, hē kalpanā kōr: sakāḷchē 08:00 vajlēt, tū tumcho chā piyetā, Rahulacho novō Bollywood gōndōḷ vāchetā, ani ekadēmsach BAM! Tumchyā phone-ar flash sale-chī suchanā yetā. "Sōrv vastūnkar 50% sūṭ!" tē bob mārtā, Diwali-chē phaṭākē parīm chōkchōkit. Hē, mōgyā mitrānō, Mumbai local-chē vikrīchē sāmān – gondōḷācho, utsāhōk, ani nimēshānt sompta.
normalised: Barabor, lokano, hachi tasveer kaddi: saa’tt vaagta a.m., tumi tumcho chai piyetat, Rahulache navintem Bollywood kandil vachet, ani ekaek BAM! Eka flash sale chi suchna tumchea phoneacher yetaa. "Ekaaun povaliss taka everythingacher pachas tikae shott dilla!" ti dhuum dhamaak ugddaita, Diwali chim dhamakyaampromaan ujwaad ditaa. Hem, mhojea ixttanu, Mumbai loklache barobar – gandhol, umed, ani eka flashint gele.

unnormalised: Amī sōrv thōi pālōytān, nhōy? Tumī tē sūndōr Banarasi sāḍī (tē sāḍī ji tumī Delhi-nt tumchyā kōzīṇ Priya-chyā kalyāṇāk lāgōun poloytā āslō), tumchyā āvōyk ek novō ādhunik microwave (kāhīnch nā, tichi poḍtī India-chyā svātantrya parīm poḍtī – 15/08/1947!), ani śakya nā, tē cricket bat, ji tumī vapārchāk shapath ghēvlīli, tumchyā colony-chyā vārśik samīkānt Sharmajīk harōvchāk.
normalised: Aami soglle zalleat, barabor? Tumi tem sundor Banarasi saree vaddoitat (tem tumi tumchea cousin Priyaache Delhiantlea lognakhatir nodrek ghalaitat), tumchea aajeekhatir ek fanttik nayem microwave (kityak, aami sach sangtat, tachi porno Indiaachea swatantratleaan pornea – pandhra august unnis soenchaalliss!), ani belki tumi Sharmajik tumchea colonyachea varshika machint shevotak maarpaak ticho vapar karpaak apleyaponaad dilelo tem cricket bat.

unnormalised: Punn ravāt! Tumī kharōch checkout page-ar pautāsnā – poof! Tē sāḍī gēlī. "Māph karāt, vastū atā upalabhdha nā," website chiddaytā. Microwave? Somplō. Bat-ui gayab jālō, śakya nā, kōṇṇ-tō gōḍḍī botām āslelo ani Sharmajīk harōvchāk khup gorōz āslelo gāvkar gēv gelō. Tumī shevṭī ₹12-k Maggīcho packet khōridītā ani thōḍem hōrāvlelem dīstā.
normalised: Pun zawaay! Tumak tem checkout pageacher pavpak – poof! Tem saree gele. "Maf kara, vastunka ani upalabdh na," tem website toklaaita. Tem microwave? Viktuk gelem. Tem batui gayab zalem, belki Sharmajik maarpaak vegim dakei ani aaji aspaak zalam. Tumi baar rupayan Maggichi packet gheun thodi udaas zata.

unnormalised: Tēch flash sales-chī jādu ani pisāy. Tē Bangalore traffic jam-ānt kōmī veḷāchē kśanā sārkem, jēdhā ek dhaktī fāṭ dīstā, ani tumī vijlī sārkem vēgī astā tumcho scooter tichēr ghālchāk. Chūkoylem, ani tumī sakāḷchē 09:00 vajsar thōi aḍaktā, tumchyā sōrv jīvanāchē nirṇay dukāvtā.
normalised: Ti flash sale chi zaadu, ani udhviggata. Tegi Banglurechea traffic jamanche te chhottt aslele ghaddye zai, ani tumi tumchi scootertun dhuumkarpaak vegim zaunk zai. Tumi te chuktolat, ani tumi tumchea jeevana vimochpaak nou ghanteam khatir atthoktolat.

unnormalised: Hē online bāzār, Flipkart vā Amazon sārkem (Baba Ramdev-cho Patanjali-ui tanchē flash sales karatā, mī āykātā!), chūkōvchī mūḷ bhīti-ar avalambun astāt. Tē khup sūṭichō lālc dākōytāt, tātkāḷik garōz nirmāṇ karatāt, ji tumāk gorōz nā sōrv vastū ākasmāt khōridī karāytā. (Kōbullāt: Mī ek pāvṭī flash sale-ānt 3 pressure cooker khōridī kelē. Mī ekasārkō rāvtā.)
normalised: Hi online bajar, zoxe Flipkart va Amazon (Baba Ramdevachem Patanjaliuy flash sale korta, mhaka ekutaa!), aaji aspaache bhayacher aadharit aahey. Te vhodd dikountichi gajarkhaddi dolyaanim doltaat, tumi ek zaroori zalam mhunn tumkam vastuya ghevpak laaitaat tumkam belki zaroori na. (Mhojem gupit: hanvem ek flash saleant teen pressure cooker ghetle. Hanv ekta jivithaa.)

unnormalised: Tēmuḷā, puḍchyā pāvṭī tumī flash sale-chī suchanā poloytāsnā, ūnd shvās ghē. Tē sāḍī, microwave, cricket bat ugyāth ātā, ani svōtak vichār: malā kharōch hē gorōz āsā? Vā malā kēvaḷ 26/01/2024-r kalyāṇānt dholak vājaytā parīm vājavlelem āsā?
normalised: The next time tumkam ek flash sale chi suchna dista, tumi ek dhaklli swaas gheya. Tumchem saree, microwave, ani cricket bat yeadh ttheva ani tumi tumkanaa vichara: Maka khoreponaan hachi garz aahey? Va tumi visaviss januarie don hazar chonvisacher ek lognakhatir tumchya dholakachim kheltaat?
